This is originally a $30 unit that has more recently been fetching close to $24. We’ve seen it previously dip to $20 a few times, but today’s deal takes an extra $2 off, marking the lowest price we’ve tracked for it so far. This slim tracking card is a good option to consider if you’re like me and don’t love the idea of stuffing an AirTag into your wallet and adding unnecessary bulk. It’s particularly worth checking out now while it’s down to its best price yet. Head below for more details.

items.title: Review: LOFREE Flow 2 – a low-profile CNC aluminum wireless keyboard for Mac and iOS you should check out
items.summary:
As someone who has reviewed and used plenty of mechanical keyboards, I’d started to feel like I’d seen it all in this space. Most boards today only really differ in layout or materials, while the overall design feels pretty repetitive. But the LOFREE Flow 2 we’re checking out today actually stands out. On paper, it sticks to a familiar 68-key layout, but the design is quite different, and it brings a few thoughtful additions that make it genuinely interesting. I’ve been using the Flow 2 wireless low-profile keyboard as my main board for the past few months, and it’s one I keep coming back to, even with several other keyboards sitting on my desk.

more…
